body_html:
Hi, @jlebar some more updates:

  • Compile 1 set of dispatchers for each data size instead of each data type.
  • Tried out your trick and got the tile size searching code to a much cleaner form.
  • Refactor by singling out the cost analysis for narrow matrices transposition.
  • Fixed misc issues raised.

Can I have your comments? Again, thanks for being so responsive!

body:
Hi, @jlebar some more updates:
- Compile 1 set of dispatchers for each data size instead of each data type.
- Tried out your trick and got the tile size searching code to a much cleaner form.
- Refactor by singling out the cost analysis for narrow matrices transposition.
- Fixed misc issues raised.

Can I have your comments? Again, thanks for being so responsive!
